settings.FooterCompetitiveTitle: We Have The Best Competitive Prices
settings.FooterCompetitiveText: Why settle for less when you can have it all? Avita Athletica sportswear combines premium quality with contemporary style. Our designs are not only performance-driven but also fashion-forward, ensuring you look as good as you feel.
